result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Clifton Jerome Mobbs

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Clifton Jerome Mobbs appeared by video.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Clifton Jerome Mobbs.  Prosecuting attorney Josh Milder in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel requests adjourned pretrial conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.
Court modified no contact order to no violent contact for the purpose of childcare only.

Defendant Clifton Jerome Mobbs appeared by video.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Clifton Jerome Mobbs.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Defense's bail hearing held.  Arguments heard.  For reason stated on the record, Court modified no contact order to no violent contact for the purpose of childcare only.  Defense counsel requests adjourned pretrial conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Clifton Jerome Mobbs in court.  Attorney Corey R. Flynn in court for Clifton Jerome Mobbs.  Prosecuting attorney Julie D Knyszek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel has offer but needs discovery.  Defense counsel requests bail review hearing on no contact order.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Bail/bond hearing scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Court ordered no contact with A.M.M. (03/05/1995)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Clifton Jerome Mobbs in court with attorney Maryann Corea.  Defendant Clifton Jerome Mobbs in custody.  Kelly O'Neill appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Skwierawski, Branch 41.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
